name: Ninja TB201 Detect Power Blender Pro, BlendSense Technology, For Smoothies, Shakes & More, 1800 Peak Watts, 72 oz. Pitcher, Blender, Black
short_description: 1800 PEAK WATT MOTOR BASE: Made for powering through the toughest of ingredients. BLENDSENSE: Ninja’s Smartest Technology that can automatically adjust speed and time for perfectly smooth results. Innovative dial informs user what mode the blender is in for a truly user-friendly experience. 72-OZ. FULL-SIZE PITCHER: Great for making large batches of smoothies and frozen drinks for the whole family. TOTAL CRUSHING & CHOPPING BLADE ASSEMBLY: The Ninja Total Crushing & Chopping Blades give you perfectly crushed ice for your smoothies and frozen drinks, chopped veggies, and more! SINGLE-TOUCH PRESET PROGRAMS: One-touch Chop programs allow you to process and chop ingredients in the 72 oz. pitcher for things like salsa and much more! VARIABLE SPEED: Allows for complete manual control of speed settings*. *Only in Full-Size Pitcher. DISHWASHER SAFE: Containers, lids, and blades are all top-rack dishwasher safe. WHAT’S INCLUDED: 1800 PW Motor Base, 72 oz. Pitcher, Total Crushing & Chopping Blade Assembly.
product_description: The Ninja Detect Power Blender Pro with BlendSense Technology allows you to add any ingredients, press the dial, and watch them blend into a smooth output. Watch the blades turn ice to snow for smoothies, shakes, and frozen drinks. The food processor capabilities will chop veggies for a salsa and more. It is the Ninja blender that automatically adjusts speed & time for perfectly smooth results.

name: Chefman Obliterator 48 oz Countertop Blender for Smoothies, 1380W Motor to Crush Ice, Nuts, and Frozen Fruit with Stainless Steel Blade, Auto Blend Function, Includes Tamper and Scraper - Midnight
short_description: ICE-CRUSHING POWER: This 1380W high powered blender obliterates anything in its path! Its advanced airflow breaks down ice with ease while staying quiet throughout operation, making it a perfect smoothie blender or crushed ice maker. HIGH BLENDING CAPACITY: With a 48 oz shatter-resistant Tritan blending jar, the Obliterator has enough space to make shakes and smoothies for everyone. The durable construction even allows for blending hot liquids with the lid cover removed (cover with a towel to avoid excess splatter.) AUTO BLEND: Optimize your blending without any guesswork! The Auto Blend function analyzes every ingredient added, automatically customizing the blend settings for your ideal consistency every time. It’s a professional blender that does the hard work for you. INTUITIVE CONTROLS: The dial control panel includes 5 blending speeds and a pulse option to finetune your blending. Presets include a countdown timer and LED alerts notify you when you need to “Fix Jar” or “Add Liquid.” TWO WAYS TO CLEAN: Keeping this blender for kitchen clean is a breeze. Either run the “Clean” preset with soap and water or throw the accessories directly into the dishwasher and avoid any hassle. The innovative blunt-blade design ensures safety while cleaning without sacrificing performance. ART ON THE COUNTERTOP: Created at the intersection of form and function, this 2024 Red Dot Design Award-winning smoothie maker emulsifies and purees with ease and looks beautiful doing it. Its black-matte finish blends in effortlessly with any kitchen décor. ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: Everything you need for this one-stop blender mixer. Purchase includes a 2-in-1 tamper and scraper tool to tackle any blending challenge. The lid features a BPA free cover which doubles as a 1 oz liquid measuring cup. TRUSTED QUALITY: UL approved with advanced safety technology for long-lasting durability. Backed by a 5-year warranty provided by Chefman. 1380W/120V—RJ27-T1-MIDNIGHT-AM

name: Hamilton Beach Power Elite Wave Action Blender For Smoothies, 40 Oz Glass Jar, 12 Functions Including Puree, Crush Ice, 700 Watts - Black (58148A)
short_description: POWERFUL BLENDING PERFORMANCE: With 700 watts of peak blending power and stainless steel Ice Sabre blades, this protein shake blender gives you all the power you need to make smoothies, protein shakes, frozen drinks and more. ULTRA-SMOOTH RESULTS WITH PATENTED WAVE~ACTION(R) SYSTEM: As you blend, ingredients are continuously forced down into the blades and circulated around the jar — thoroughly crushing the hardest foods with ease in this smoothie blender. SERVE WITH EASE: The spout on this countertop blender lets you pour contents into your glass without spills or drips, so serving with this electric blender is easy and mess-free. EASY TO CLEAN WITH DISHWASHER SAFE GLASS JAR, LID AND BLADES: This Hamilton Beach blender has a glass jar that holds 40 ounces; The jar, lid, and removable blades on the blender are all dishwasher safe. 12 BLENDING FUNCTIONS FOR MAXIMUM VERSATILITY: This multi-function kitchen blender has 12 functions controlled by 5 buttons on the easy-to-read control panel. It blends and crushes ice for smoothies and milkshakes, purees, dices, chops and more.
product_description: All the power you need to: Mix, puree, chop, crush ice, and more - with only 5 simple buttons. With 700 watts of peak blending power in this milkshake blender. Do not fill blender jar beyond the 3-Cup (710-ml) level. Tips & care for the best performance: The minimum amount of liquid needed per recipe is one cup (8 oz/250 ml). If using this blender for shakes and smoothies, add more liquid if your mixture is not blending properly to ensure smooth consistency. To add food or liquid to when blender is operating, open the hinged pouring cap and add ingredients through the opening. If blending action stops during blending or ingredients stick to sides of jar, there may not be enough liquid in the jar to blend efficiently.

name: Aeitto Blenders for Kitchen with 1800W Motor, 68Oz. Large Capacity, 2-in-1 Blender & Grinder Combo, BPA-Free Countertop Professional Blender for Smoothies, Ice Crush, Frozen Drinks, Silver
short_description: 1800W Highest Power Motor: Aeitto blender features a professional-grade motor with up to 1800 watts of power and a peak speed of 25,000 RPM. This blenders for kitchen can quickly process ingredients and ice to create drinks, smoothies, and grind various powders. In addition, an overheat protection device is designed to ensure safer use. 68oz. Extra Large Capacity: Designed for large families,this blenders for kitchen has a large 68oz.jar that can process more ingredients at once, perfect for large families or multiple dinners, serving 7-8 people at a time, reducing the hassle of multiple operations. There's also a 28oz. grinding cup designed for grinding coffee beans, nuts, spices and more. 2-in-1 Blender & Grinder Combo: Blending & Grinding 2-in-1 Kitchen Combo offers two functions and meets your different requirements.With 2 different containers and 2 types of blades, with the blending blade is ideal for smoothies, milkshakes, juices, and frozen drinks, the grinding blade is perfect for grinding coffee beans, nuts, and spices. Just one machine can help you do both blending and grinding, saving you money. Auto Cleaning & Dishwasher Safe: The blender for smoothies is very easy to clean and doesn't take much time. Just add half warm water and a few drops of dishwashing soap to the blender and let it run for 30 to 60 seconds for automatic cleaning. The blender jar and grinding cup are made from BPA-free material and all parts except the base are dishwasher safe. Classic & Simple Operation: The smoothie blender's control panel is user-friendly and offers unparalleled convenience, making cooking easy and fun. The control panel is simple and easy to use with all function buttons visible at a glance.

name: OMMO Blender 1800W, Professional High Speed Countertop Blender with Durable Stainless Steel Blades, 60oz BPA Free Blender for Shakes and Smoothies, Nuts, Ice and Fruits, Dishwasher Safe
short_description: 🍨🍨Professional-Grade Power: This blender boasts a powerful 1800W motor that can help you create a wide variety of delicious drinks. Whether you're making protein shakes, smoothies, or frozen cocktails, the OMMO Blender has you covered 🍨🍨Hardened Ice-Crushing Stainless Steel: With food-grade 304 stainless steel, the six-blade design can crush ice with ease, making it perfect for creating icy smoothies and frozen drinks 🍨🍨Variable Speed and Pulse Function: The OMMO Blender allows you to adjust the speed and pulse as you blend, giving you complete control over the texture of your drinks. You can create anything from silky smoothies to chunky salsa 🍨🍨Large Capacity Jar: Our 60oz jar is durable, BPA-free plastic and can hold up to 8 cups of liquid. Perfect for making large batches of drinks for the whole family, and a well-working blender for kitchen 🍨🍨Unique Lid Design& Dishwasher Safe: The OMMO Blender's lid is designed with a handle that makes it easy to open without spilling your drink. name: Ninja SS151 TWISTi Blender DUO, High-Speed 1600 WP Smoothie Maker & Nutrient Extractor* 5 Functions Smoothie, Spreads & More, smartTORQUE, 34-oz. Pitcher & (2) To-Go Cups, Gray
short_description: TOTAL CONTROL: Built-in Twist Tamper plus high-speed blades to power through tough ingredients with 1600 Peak-Watt Power for no stalling, no stirring, no shaking to get the perfect texture. BUILT-IN TWIST TAMPER: Twist the tamper to push ingredients down toward the high-speed blades for thick and even results. SMOOTHER BLENDS: Hybrid-Edge Blades Assembly blends, chops and crushes at high speed to deliver better breakdown of frozen whole fruits and veggies, nuts, seeds, and ice for smoother blends. SMARTTORQUE TECHNOLOGY: The power-dense motor maintains high speed to deliver uninterrupted performance and is designed for heavy food loads. 5 VERSATILE FUNCTIONS: Easily make Extractions, Smoothies, Frozen Drinks, Spreads and Bowls with the touch of a button. AUTO-IQ TECHNOLOGY: Take the guesswork out of drink making with intelligent programs that combine unique timed pulsing, blending, and pausing patterns that do the work for you. DRIZZLE CAP: Add ingredients while processing to customize flavors and textures with the removable drizzle cap.
product_description: The Ninja TWISTi, High-Speed Blender DUO blender delivers the smoothest purees and finest blends of any Ninja pitcher with its built-in Twist Tamper, Hybrid-Edge high-speed blades, and a powerful motor. The built-in Twist Tamper pushes down ingredients toward the high-speed blades to create perfectly thick outputs like smoothie bowls and nut butters.

name: Blenders for Kitchen, Smoothie Blender - 1800W Professional Countertop Blender with 68oz Dishwasher-Safe Pitcher, Ice Crusher for Frozen Drinks & Smoothies, Overheat Protection
short_description: Pro-Level Blending Power: Packing a punch with up to 1800 watts, this kitchen blender makes quick work of ice, frozen fruits, and tough ingredients, whipping up smoothies, shakes, and more like a pro. Big Batch Blending for the Whole Crew: The extra-large 68-oz. pitcher is perfect for family meals or entertaining, letting you blend up smoothies, frozen drinks, and sauces in one go—no need for multiple rounds. All-in-One Kitchen Workhorse: From smoothies and soups to grinding coffee and spices, this blender does it all. It’s your go-to for blending, chopping, grinding, and pureeing—no extra gadgets needed. Cleans Up in a Flash: The BPA-free pitcher, lids, and blades are dishwasher-safe, and the self-clean feature makes cleanup a breeze—just add soap and water, hit blend, and you’re done. Smart Blending, Perfect Results: With adjustable speeds and pulse control, this blender gives you total control to nail the perfect texture every time, whether it’s silky smoothies or chunky salsas. Plus, it’s built to last with overheat protection.
